    • calculateInvocationsPerBatchJob

      public int calculateInvocationsPerBatchJob(String batchType, SetRemovalTimeBatchConfiguration configuration)
      Description copied from interface: BatchJobHandler
      Determine the number of invocations ber patch job. This can be defined by the related batch job handler specifically or otherwise taken from the engine configuration.
      Specified by:
      calculateInvocationsPerBatchJob in interface BatchJobHandler<SetRemovalTimeBatchConfiguration>
      Overrides:
      calculateInvocationsPerBatchJob in class AbstractBatchJobHandler<SetRemovalTimeBatchConfiguration>
      Parameters:
      batchType - the batch's type to help determine any engine configuration related to it
      configuration - the configuration object
      Returns:
      the number of invocations ber patch job
